meanings.definition: A family of ruminant mammals including deer, elk, and moose.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of cervids in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The cervids had a party in the woods.
meanings.sent4: The majestic cervids moved like shadows in the twilight.
meanings.sent5: The sound of cervids echoing through the trees was enchanting.

meanings.definition: Any member of the family Cervidae.

meanings.sent2: Cervids are known for their antlers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cervid stole my sandwich.
meanings.sent4: She moved with the grace of a cervid in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The elusive cervid disappeared into the dense forest.
